item.title: Moving to eclipse
item.description: Moving to eclipse # We started to move the many parts of the furo project from theNorstroem to eclipse last month. This forced us to restructure the individual parts of furo. The restructuring definitely brings us advantages and a simpler view of the big picture. Migration guide: # Web related stuff: # There are no changes to make, all npm packages have the same name. API and spec related stuff: # All you have to do is
